location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 79 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports that the affairs of Muscat are still in the 'greatest confusion' and that Shaikh Rashed of Gulfar is said to proceeding with a large body of forces to assist the Imam's sons. Also reports arrival of Royal Admiral Captain [Huddent?] to Bombay - from England - en route to China and discusses other administrative matters.
